meanings.sent1: The hikers marveled at the majestic puys in the distance.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the formation of puys to understand volcanic activity.
meanings.sent3: The little bird built its nest on top of the puys, thinking it was a cozy spot.
meanings.sent4: The puys dotted the landscape like tiny earth pimples.
meanings.sent5: The puys stood stoically against the backdrop of the fiery sunset.

meanings.definition: A type of French medieval dance.
meanings.sent1: The dancers twirled gracefully to the rhythm of the puys.
meanings.sent2: In medieval times, the puys were a popular form of entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The villagers laughed as the clumsy cat attempted to mimic the puys.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as light and airy as the puys themselves.
meanings.sent5: The puys dance brought joy to all who watched.

meanings.definition: A type of medieval French poetry.
meanings.sent1: The students analyzed the intricate verses of the puys in their literature class.
meanings.sent2: Poets often drew inspiration from nature when composing puys.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the silly rhymes in the puys they found.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed like a gentle stream in the puys she penned.
meanings.sent5: The puys poetry painted vivid pictures in the minds of the readers.
